notes.text:
This update for xfig fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2023-45920: Fixed NULL pointer dereference when calling XGetWMHints() (bsc#1222057).
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.text: ** DISPUTED ** Xfig v3.2.8 was discovered to contain a NULL pointer dereference when calling XGetWMHints(). NOTE: this is disputed because it is not expected that an X application should continue to run when there is arbitrary anomalous behavior from the X server or window manager.
notes.title: CVE description
